channel.title: Showing Pk Points

item.title: Showing Pk Points
item.dc:creator: @LeScape_Pk LeScape Pk
item.description:
@LeScape_Pk wrote:

this is what i have, the entire code, feel free to use it if you wish, just edit out the www.lescapepk.tk because all it does right now is take you to yahoo.com

public void writePlayers1() { int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); sendFrame126("", 13589); sendFrame126("", 13590); sendFrame126("@whi@LeScape Pk", 13591); sendFrame126("@whi@Players Online: "+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(), 13592); sendFrame126("@whi@Pk Points: "+pkpoints, 13593); sendFrame126("@whi@Kill Count: "+killcount, 13594); sendFrame126("@whi@www.lescapepk.tk", 13595); sendFrame126("", 13596); sendFrame126("", 13597); sendFrame126("", 13598); sendFrame126("", 13599); sendFrame126("", 13600); sendQuest("@whi@The Bank of LeScape Pk", 5383); setInterfaceWalkable(13588); }

Read full topic

item.title: Showing Pk Points
item.dc:creator: @Ptolemy_Alch Ptolemy Alch
item.description:
@Ptolemy_Alch wrote:

I want it to show the pk points at top of screen, the code i have is this:

sendFrame126("@gre@Pk Points = "+pkpoints, 13595);

It’s not working…someone correct my code please?
